description:
The Tournament of Power has been on the back burner for a while. Bored of day-to-day work and tired of waiting, Goku convinces Zeno to get the ball rolling!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let`s Do It, Zen-Oh Sama! The All-Universe Martial Arts Tournament!!
Mach schon, König Zen-Oh! – Das Turnier der Universen!
Vamos Nessa, Senhor Zen`Ou! O Torneio de Artes Marciais entre Todos os Universos!!
やろうぜ全王様! 宇宙一武道会!!
